```{r}
library(leaflet)
  rand_lng = function(n = 10) rnorm(n, 10.829422, .01)
  rand_lat = function(n = 10) rnorm(n, 1.236402, .01)
m = leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addCircles(rand_lng(50), rand_lat(50), radius = runif(50, 10, 200))
 
m
```
